title: NERO LINUX 3.5.1.0 (32 + 64 BIT) EASY INSTALL
description:
NERO LINUX v3.5.1.0 (32 + 64 BIT)
         =================================


---------------------------------------------
| EASY INSTALLATION INSTRUCTIONS IN TORRENT |
---------------------------------------------


The Next-Generation Burning Application for the Linux OS.

Nero Linux 3 is the definitive burning application for the Linux operating system.
Based on the award-winning current Nero Burning ROM platform, Nero Linux 3 is the most powerful and versatile burning application available for Linux, and the only application to offer Blu-ray Disc and HD DVD data burning support.

Experience the most comprehensive burning application for the Linux OS

    * Enjoy the same functionalities as in the newest version of Nero Burning ROM
    * Burn data using any optical disc format, including CD, DVD, Blu-ray Disc, and HD DVD
    * Ensure a quick and easy setup using SmartDetect automatic drive support
    * Manage your music collection with integrated audio capabilities such as high speed digital audio extraction and FreeDB, which automatically searches for disc information over the Internet

    * Command line client
    * Nero Linux 3.5 now lets users store highest-quality and space-saving MP4 
      audio files through Advanced Audio Coding (AAC)

    * ISO 9660 CD/DVD (Joliet support)
    * Audio CD (CD-DA)
    * CD, DVD, Blu-ray, and HD DVD copy (with advanced settings)
    * CD-Text
    * CD-Extra support (with advanced settings)
    * Bootable CD/DVD
    * Multisession CDs, DVDs, Blu-ray Discs, and HD DVDs (advanced features)
    * Layer Jump Recording support
    * DVD-Video and miniDVD (from DVD-Video files)
    * CD, DVD, Blu-ray, and HD DVD image recording
    * DVD double layer support
    * .nrg/.cue/.iso image import
    * Overburning support for CD and DVD
    * Ultra-Buffer software buffering technology
    * Speed tests and simulated burning
    * Data verification after burning

* Some formats and features are only available if they are supported by the recorder

--------------------
System Requirements:
--------------------

General 

    * Linux kernel 2.4 or higher (2.6 recommended) with X-Window
    * Glibc 2.3.2 and libstdc++ 6 3.4
    * GTK+ 2.4.10 (or higher)

Processor and memory
* 800 MHz IntelÃ‚Â« PentiumÃ‚Â« III processor, AMD Sempron 2200+ processors or equivalent
* 128 MB RAM

Hard disc space
* 50 MB for program installation

Optical device
* CD, DVD, Blu-ray, or HD DVD recordable or rewritable drive for burning

Supported Distributions

    * Red Hat Enterprise Linux 4
    * SuSE Linux 10.0
    * Fedora 4
    * Debian GNU/Linux 3.1
    * Ubuntu 5.10
    * Linspire 6.0.x
    * Mandriva 2008

Supported Languages
* Nero Linux currently supports 26 languages

Supported Recorders
* All CD, DVD, Blu-Ray, and HD DVD recorders


Optional requirements
* Sound device and speakers.


* Nero Linux 3 supports all higher versions of the above supported distributions


URL....http://www.nero.com
